reload.message: You need to reload VSCode to apply the settings. Do you want to reload?
markdown-info.markdown-it-info.enable:
Specifies whether to enable the markdown-it-info plugin. When checked, the plugin is enabled; when unchecked, it is disabled.

markdown-it-info is a markdown-it plugin that allows easy addition of information boxes and admonition boxes in Markdown documents. This plugin enables you to visually emphasize important information and improve document readability.
markdown-info.markdown-it-info.previewSt:
Select a stylesheet. Available options are as follows:

• default: Uses the default stylesheet.
• qiita: Applies a Qiita-like stylesheet.
• zenn: Applies a Zenn-like stylesheet.
markdown-info.markdown-it-info.defaultTi: Sets the default title for boxes. This will be used when no title is specified.
